name: PdsIT-pkg
body:
### Welcome to PDSIT Package
This package is a set of functions for to work with Digital Signal Processing and Information Theory.

### Citations
To cite PDSIT package in publications use:

  Fernando Pujaico (2015).
  PDSIT - Software for digital signal processing in Information Theory.
  URL http:// 

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is:

  @software{PDSIT,
    author    = {Fernando Pujaico},
    title     = {{PDSIT} Software for digital signal procesing in Information Theory },
    year      = {2015},
    version   = {1.0.0},
    url       = {}
  }

We have invested a lot of time and effort in creating PDSIT, please cite it
when using it.
### Authors and Contributors
This package was wrote by @trucomanx.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with package? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
